languages.text: Силовой молот обрушился на древние кости Тисифоны, и тело в одно мгновение разнесло на мелкие осколки... И в тот миг все, наконец, закончилось.

traits.locale_text: Силовой молот обрушивается на древние кости Тисифоны, и тело в одно мгновение разносит на мелкие осколки. Укатившийся под ноги череп с ужасающем воплем рассыпается в пыль... И все, наконец, заканчивается.

languages.text: The power hammer slammed into Tisiphone's ancient bones and instantly shattered her frame into tiny particles... And with that, it was all over at last.
languages.original_text: Силовой молот обрушился на древние кости Тисифоны, и тело в одно мгновение разнесло на мелкие осколки... И в тот миг все, наконец, закончилось.

traits.locale_text: The power hammer slammed into Tisiphone's ancient bones and instantly shattered her frame to smithereens... And with that, everything was over at last.
The power hammer slammed into Tisiphone's ancient bones and instantly shattered her frame to smithereens... And with that, everything was over at last.
The power hammer slammed into Tisiphone's ancient bones and instantly shattered her frame to smithereens... And with that, everything was over at last.
The power hammer slammed into Tisiphone's ancient bones and instantly shattered her frame to smithereens... And with that, everything was over at last.
The power hammer slammed into Tisiphone's ancient bones and instantly shattered her frame into tiny particles... And with that, it was all over at last.
The power hammer slammed into Tisiphone's ancient bones and instantly shattered her frame into tiny particles... And with that, it was all over at last.

languages.text: パワーハンマーがティシフォンの古びた骨めがけて叩きつけられると、彼女の骨格はたちまち木っ端みじんになった…こうして、ついにすべてが終わったのだ。
languages.original_text: The power hammer slammed into Tisiphone's ancient bones and instantly shattered her frame into tiny particles... And with that, it was all over at last.

traits.locale_text: パワーハンマーがティシフォンの古びた骨めがけて叩きつけられると、彼女の骨格はたちまち木っ端みじんになった…こうして、ついにすべてが終わったのだ。

languages.text: 动力锤狠狠地砸在提西福涅的骨头上，瞬间将她的身体砸得粉碎……随着这一击，一切都彻底结束了。
languages.original_text: The power hammer slammed into Tisiphone's ancient bones and instantly shattered her frame into tiny particles... And with that, it was all over at last.

traits.locale_text: 动力锤狠狠地砸在提西福涅的骨头上，瞬间将她的身体砸得粉碎……随着这一击，一切都彻底结束了。

languages.text: La masse s'est lourdement abattue sur les os de Tisiphone et les a brisés en milliers de particules... mettant enfin un terme à ses machinations.
languages.original_text: The power hammer slammed into Tisiphone's ancient bones and instantly shattered her frame into tiny particles... And with that, it was all over at last.

traits.locale_text: La masse s'est lourdement abattue sur les os de Tisiphone et les a brisés en milliers de particules... mettant enfin un terme à ses machinations.

languages.text: El martillo de energía se estampó contra los vetustos huesos de Tisiphone, reduciendo al instante su cuerpo a diminutas partículas... Y de ese modo, todo terminó por fin.
languages.original_text: The power hammer slammed into Tisiphone's ancient bones and instantly shattered her frame into tiny particles... And with that, it was all over at last.

traits.locale_text: El martillo de energía se estampó contra los vetustos huesos de Tisiphone, reduciendo al instante su cuerpo a diminutas partículas... Y de ese modo, todo terminó por fin.

languages.text: Der Energiehammer schlägt gegen Tisiphones uralte Knochen, die augenblicklich in winzige Partikel zersplittern ... Und damit war endlich alles vorbei.
languages.original_text: The power hammer slammed into Tisiphone's ancient bones and instantly shattered her frame into tiny particles... And with that, it was all over at last.

traits.locale_text: Der Energiehammer krachte gegen Tisiphones uralte Knochen und pulverisierte sie augenblicklich ... Und damit war endlich alles vorbei.

languages.text: Güç çekici Tisiphone'nin kadim kemiklerine çarptığı gibi vücudunu anında ufacık parçalara ayırdı... Böylece bu iş nihayet bitti.
languages.original_text: The power hammer slammed into Tisiphone's ancient bones and instantly shattered her frame into tiny particles... And with that, it was all over at last.

traits.locale_text: Güç çekici Tisiphone'nin kadim kemiklerine çarptığı gibi vücudunu anında ufacık parçalara ayırdı... Böylece bu iş nihayet bitti.
